amendatorysection.para: The department shall remit reimbursements received pursuant to section 2-3226.08 to the State Treasurer for credit to the Water Contingency Cash Fund. The department shall calculate the amount of such reimbursements so remitted. After the initial disbursement of financial assistance by the department as authorized in section 2-3226.07, the State Treasurer shall, at the end of each calendar month, transfer the balance of the Water Contingency Cash Fund to the Cash Reserve Fund.
